name: Banquet Brawl!
description:
Dinner in the banquet hall is getting too boring. Start a food fight and make a mess to liven up the party! Get everyone to join in on the Banquet Brawl!

Click on anybody to select them. Next click on anybody nearby to throw your dinner at them to get them mad and join in on the fight. Try to get everyone involved in the fight and make the biggest mess possible!

Controls:
Left click to select starting character. Right Click to deselect.
Q/E to rotate level.

This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 to the theme of "Let There Be Chaos".

Developed by Rubber Ducks:
Daniel MacCormick
Alain Sangalang
Kody Wood
